name: find-metric
description: Search for a curated and trustworthy business metric in the Metabase instance to use for your analysis. You will receive metric details like its metric_id that can be used in other tools. Provide a detailed description of the metric, including both its full name and any known acronyms or abbreviations. This ensures that the metric can be accurately identified.

message.description: A comprehensive description of the metric you are searching for. Include the full name and any relevant acronyms or abbreviations
